name: They Watch
description:
After a very long trip , you arrive at your holiday home. But soon you find out that something is off and no move goes unnoticed. They watch is a horror game that focuses on building a strong horror / thriller atmosphere without relaying on cheap scares. CONTROLS
  • WASD - MOVE
  • F - INTERACT

1.0.4 UPDATE

  • Lighting improvement
  • Made the keys more visible
  • Minor gameplay changes
